description: Uploads a file that can then be used either as a default in a FileUploadCard from Q App definition or as a file that is used inside a single Q App run. The purpose of the document is determined by a scope parameter that indicates whether it is at the app definition level or at the app session level.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the card the file is associated with.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Q App the file is associated with.

parameters.name: fileContentsBase64
parameters.description: The base64-encoded contents of the file to upload.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file being uploaded.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Whether the file is associated with a Q App definition or a specific Q App session.

nested_items.name: fileId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier assigned to the uploaded file.
